koncat-0.1.0.0: An experimental, modular IRC Bot

PortabilityLinux
StabilityUnstable
Maintainergrab@thereisnobreak.net
Safe HaskellNone

Koncat.Core

Contents

  • Starting the Bot

Description

Koncat.Core exports the bootstrap function, which is used to start the Bot. Internally, Koncat.Core handles connecting to the server and dispatching server queries.

Synopsis

  • bootstrap :: IO ()

Starting the Bot

bootstrap :: IO ()Source

Set up Exception handling, start off the conversation with the server and start providing IRC Bot functionalities.
